name: ToastEd
description:
MADE FOR 100 LINES OF CODE GAMEMAKER JAM!

A TOAST EPIDEMIC has spread like wildfire on planet Toasterus! Only a toaster named Ed can save this planet by TOASTING the evil bread zombies! 

~ made in 100 lines of code ~

FEATURES:

Uhh... I dunno, toast bread?

CONTROLS:

WASD to move;

Mouse to aim;

Left click to shoot  TOAST THE BREAD ZOMBIES
